case.state: Yes! This table is awesome! You have awesome taste in tables! We're all gonna cum so hard!
Welcome to Casa de Orendi. Who's up for board games?
Seriously guys? The universe is ending and all you want to do is play strip poker? I'm so in!
Who told you where I was?!
I am, like, so happy you picked me! This is totally going to be the best game of your life!
Whatda'ya mean you picked me? I picked you! You're welcome, by the way!
Let's! Get! Naked!
Oh hi Nova! I love the new look! Pretty cool how holograms are allowed to play here, huh?
What am I, blind? Of course I see it!
Oh, my, god, it's Beatrix! This match is going to be the best!
Seriously? We're doin' this here? Psh, fine, have fun with sand up your butt when you lose.
Aha ha! Screw you and your shoes! Can't get sand in your shoes when you don't wear any!
Hi Orendi I'm also Orendi!
Another me? Just like my dream!
You again? Yes, me, I am Orendi. Cool. Yay.
Double the Orendi, double... dendry-- double endry!
Ever play strip poker against a Varimorph before? 'Cause I totally am one of those things and it's going to be awesome!
You're all going down! You'll never defeat me and my fanciful diner manners!
Hi, I'm Orendi. Thank you so much for inviting us. We hardly get out anymore and oh my god, I love this kitchen.
I know what'cher thinkin' and no, I'm not here to hurt people. I wanna watch people masturbate and maybe masturbate too! I'm into more than just violence, ya know!
Hi my name is Orendi and I like to break things and hurt people but I also like to see titties and cum to them so let's do this!
I, uh... Guess I don't need cards.
Hell yeah! Good hand to start! No cards needed!
What, me? Give cards? And ruin this hand? What am I, crazy?
Hey, dealer, gimme ~cards~ cards.
Give me ~cards~ cards, or I will eat your face!
~cards~ new cards, please!
Gimme ~cards~.
~cards~! Now!
Lemme get ~cards~. What do you mean "go fish?"
Haha ha ha!
Four out of five voices in my head agree, this hand is awesome!
No! What a terrible hand!... Nah. Just playin'. My hand rules!
Ha! Look at this hand! I told you the dealer loves me!
Fuck these cards! That's not a threat, that's a ♪promise♪!
Aw man, all I have is a 10 and a bunch of letters. I lost for sure!
No pairs... no numbers in order... not even two colors! I've totally lost!
Stupid cards! I know how to count! I don't need your help!
It doesn't matter how good my hand is. It'll never bring back my hat!
These cards are so good... I think I'm gonna... I think I'm gonna cry...
Ahaha ha ha! Good cards, good cards!
I know you wanna get a load of my luscious lady lumps, but you're gonna have to wait another round!
Where were these cards when I still had my hat?!
You done screwed up, Orendi, but you got another chance!
If I lose this hand somehow, I am seriously going to eat someone's legs off!
Haha ha ha! No Orendi crotch for you~!
Orendi is back! Orendi is mad!
Haha ha! I'm not out yet!
In your faces! I got good cards!
Are these cards for real? Are you for real? Is anything real?
Uh, I've got four hands, not counting this new one. Is that cheating? No? Cool!
Man, these cards are boring. They don't have flames, or brains, or anything cool like that on them...
Hey guys, you dare me to eat all of the cards?!
This reminds me of a game I played with Rendain. Except it didn't involve stripping. Or cards. Actually, it was just me blasting him with Chaos Bolts.
Hey! These cards remind me of Pendles! They're all squiggly, just like he is!
What the hell is this hand?! Seriously, what is it? Is it good? Is it bad? I don't even know!
Welp. Two twins and a pile of ass.
Why's it gotta be five cards? If it were four, I could hold a card in each hand!
Sweet! A full house! That's when you have five cards, right?
Don't you guys just looove mediocre hands? I can't get enough of them! Why look, I have one right now! Sooo exciting!
Damn! At this rate I might lose my, uh... whatever I was gonna take off next!
You know, I can change my gender at will. If I lose this hand, ya'll might get an eyeful of giant Varimorph dick!
If I lose this hand, I will eat my shorts! I may or may not follow through on that...
Did I mention I'm goin' commando? You're gonna get lucky if I lose!
Hey! I was just thinking it'd be funny if I got a pair and look at this, I got a pair! I was right it is funny!
These cards don't seem to fully appreciate that I'm exposed right now. Very rude, cards! Very rude!
Ugh, I forget, is red higher than black, or is it the other way around?
Yes! Mediocrity! Exactly what I needed right now!
Ooh. Am I gonna touch myself? Will I be safe this turn? The suspense is killing me!
Welp, you know what they say... What? What're you lookin' at me for?
If I lose this hand, I will eat my shorts!... Oh that's right, I lost them already...
If I lose this hand, I will eat, uh... myself? Sure, let's go with that.
Pah, you think I care about a bad hand with how you guys are doing? Nope! No way!
Bad hand, big whoop, but at least you guys are doing way worse!
Hey look, a bad hand! Maybe now I'll be doing as bad as you guys are!
I wouldn't wipe my ass with this hand!
I can't believe this hand! I'm going to lose! It's the end of the world!
This hand! It's so terrible!
Ugh, damn it. Junk hand.
Aw man... My dream of winning the game dressed exactly how I am now... Poof, gone...
Why do these cards hate me?
Ugh. Stupid cards and their stupid shapes and numbers...
Argh. Freakin' stupid poker and its stupid odds...
You yankin' my chain with these cards? You pissin' on my leg and tellin' me it's rainin'?
Crap! Now is not the time to forget how to count. I can't tell if this is a good hand or not!
Damn it! I've got five hands right now, and none of them are helping!
I will burn all these cards in the biggest, hottest fire!
Yes! An unbeatable hand!... Oh wait, hold on, I read them wrong. My hand sucks!
Grrr, fuck you, cards!
Actually, thinking about it, we're completely at the mercy of random chance here, so did I even have any influence on my misfortune or was it all decided from the beginning?
This hand is, uh... wha's the word? Oh yeah, shit!
Damn it! I'm torn between showing off my hot bod and winning!
Lucky you! You're gonna get a chance to see me show off some more!
The one voice in my head is like "Damn it, Orendi! You've gotta win!" But then the other voices are like "yes yes yes yes yes yes yes!"
Welp, I fold... Wait, what?! I'm not allowed to fold?! Damn it!
I hate these cards, I hate poker, and I hate ~player~'s face!
A poem for these cards: they really really suck, seriously what the fuck, burn them in a fire, fire fire, fire fire.
Welp, guess it's gonna be 'batin' time for me soon.
I'm out!
Damn it!
You ready to see me work it? 'Cause it looks like it's time to work it!
Stock broker? No, bartender. No no no, masked wrestler! Final answer!
I KNEW IT! I totally smelled it comin'!
... Kidneys? No wait, lungs. No no! Brains! Definitely brains!
Geez, take a step outside of Ekkunar or Orban or wherever you come from once in a while.
It's so dumb! It's just a big stupid cone! I could make that hat with my butt!
As long as you don't mind my random slam poetry sessions!
Yo, little man, what's with the blindfold? You about to pin the tail on the donkey?
What's with the blindfold? Is there a pinata? Tell me there's a pinata!
Of course I would! Violence is how I show affection!
Doubts about what? If they could do the thing they couldn't do? I don't get why they're havin' doubts when they clearly can't do that thing they tried to do.
Scalewolf hearts. Too bad no one let me go find some last time we were on Ekkunar...
My unluckiest day has to be that time me and my family got abducted by a psycho robot and our home planet got destroyed. Nothin' tops that.
Who died?... No seriously, you think you can hide the scent of death from me? Killing is, like, my whole deal!

Wuzzat? You wanna know more about me? Well, I was abducted and enslaved by a psycho robot, stole some crap, broke some crap, stole then broke some crap, and helped take down a tyrant. You're the weird one for asking.
Wuzzat? You wanna know more about me? What, do you get off knowing that I was abducted by a psycho robot right before my system's star was consumed by the Varelsi? You get off on all that? Weirdo.

Wuzzat? You wanna know more about me? What am I, in court again? Or are you gonna abduct me like that psycho Marquis? Or do you just get off on knowing where I left that figate I hijacked? Well jokes on you, weirdo, I'm not tellin'!

Wuzzat? You wanna know more about me? I'm sorry, I thought this was strip poker, not "tell everyone about your darkened home planet, abduction by a psycho robot, and enslaved family" poker. Fuckin' weirdo.
You really think you can take me? You really think so? Ha haha ha ha!
You think you can take me? You really think that?... Yeah, you're probably right, I suck at poker.
It's just you and me now! No going back! Nut up or shut up and nut!
It's just the two of us now! If you think I'm going down without a fight, you're wrooong!
This is it! It's either you or me! You think it's gonna be me, huh? Well I think you should shut up!
Oh no! Tall blondie doesn't like how I talk? Woe is me!
Hey! Blondie! Shut the hell up! I can talk how I damn well please!
Sorry if I'm too crazy for you, Jura. Watching your family be enslaved and tortured by a psychotic robot tends to do that to a gal.
I didn't realize you were the boss of me, Jura. You don't have an eyepatch or a badass command gauntlet, so you'll have to forgive me.
Earth? Wuzzat? You mean, like, the dirt? What's dirt have to do with anything?
Lemme answer your question with another question: what's earth?
Aw, this isn't a cosplay, sweety. I grew these arms!
D.Va, is it true that you're a totally not cute and super annoying rip-off of Toby?
D.Va, is it true that you're ripping off Toby's schtick and doing a bad job of it?
Maybe it's magik? Maybe I was born this way? Maybe I just have crazy squishy DNA that lets me mold my body like a lump of clay?
Nope! These arms are one-hundred percent Orendi-made!
Pah! Guns. Why would I need guns? I am a gun! I'll take Shadowfire over bullets any day of the week, sister!
Yes I am! I totally am magick and that's why people love me!
I'm better than human! I'm a Varimorph!
I can answer those questions for you: yes, I'm a monster, and we're only fighting if you want to be!
Me first me first me first!
My turn? Is it my turn? It's my turn now, right?
Everyone shut up! It's my turn now!
♪My turn!♪
My tuuuuurn!
Orendi is up to bat!
Alright, who's next?... Why is everyone staring at me?
My turn again? Cool. Coooooool.
I already took off my hat! What more do you want from me?
Wait, you mean to tell me that this hand isn't the best one possible?
Psh, whatever. I hate pants anyway!
Titties weren't enough for ya, huh? You dirty pervs, I love you!
You ready? You ready for some Varimorph vag? You sure you can handle it?
Y'know, there's this thing called "winning" that I'd totally like to be doing right now!
I happen to like being naked anyway!
I didn't lose, you lost! Getting naked is the point of the game, so therefore, I'm winning!
Man, you guys suck at this!
Ugh, finally, my turn!
I lost? Don't care! Still winning anyway!
I lost? Oh well I'm still in the lead!
Wow, you guys reeeeally suck if I'm winning right now.
Okay, for realsies guys, how am I winning right now?
My turn? Is it my turn? It's my turn now, right?
Everyone shut up! It's my turn now!
♪My turn!♪
Alright, who's next?... Why is everyone staring at me?
My turn again? Cool. Coooooool.
My tuuuuurn!
Orendi is up to bat!
Me again? Crap.
Damn it! Me again? Fine!
Hell yeah! Orendi is in the lead!... This is a race, right?...
Don't lie; you guys just wanted to see me get nekked, didn'tcha? It's obvious because you rigged the cards!
Damn it! Believe it or not, but I actually wanted to win!
Hey, that's a pretty accurate description, greenie!
Even if that's true -- which is isn't -- you gotta admit, I'm pretty smart for mimicking the lasers without knowing how they work, right?
Open your listening tubes, I just said I'm a Varimorph. Duh. I got these arms 'cause I wanted them.
Gonna level with you guys, even I think that taking off these bracelets one at a time would be unfair.
As much as I like making things painful, I'm just gonna take all these bracelets off at once.
I'm just gonna take these all off at once. Anyone who'd count this many items individually would be, like, literally the worst person ever.
Uh... How 'bout my vest. That counts, right?
My vest counts, right? Not too small?
What's the rules say about my vest? It counts, right?
Does my vest even count as clothing? It's kinda just, sitting here on my body, no sleeves or anything. I'm surprised the wind doesn't blow it away.
No! Not the hat! Anything but the hat!
I can't take off my hat! But I have too! But I can't!
Aw, not the hat! We've been through so much together! I even gave him a long and hard to remember name!
Aw, not the hat! We've been through so much together! I even gave him a name and gender identity!
Hey, hey! Wanna see some tits?
I hope you're ready for some alien tits, because here they come!
Are you ready for the best part? Because it's titty time!
Who wants to see some Varimorph titties?!
I guess I'll take off my shirt and... Wait! My shoes! My shoes! I could take off my shoes instead!... Oh wait, I don't wear shoes...
Okay, for realsies, now it's titty time!
Not gonna lie, I'm going commando right now. Get ready to see some Varimorph pussy!
I'm preeetty sure I forgot underwear today, so get ready to see an alien vagina!
And now, the moment of truth: does Orendi have a dick right now?
Not quite, Videl. I actually have incredibly malleable genetic structuring that allows me intentionally adapt my physiology. It's no technique; it's as natural as breathing. You were close, though!
Of course I have a mouth! How could I talk without a mouth?
Of course I have a mouth! What, did you think my words were coming out of my ass?
So Beatrix, is my body everything you dreamed it'd be?
Hey Phoebe, did'ja know that I can change my gender at will? Wanna see me do it?
That's close enough to a complement for me! I'll take it!
Spider? I never thought of it like that. Not really accurate, though, 'cause I don't have any other spidery bits. Maybe I should grow some...?
You can thank me later.
Be glad big sis Orendi is looking out for ya!
Betcha didn't see that one coming, huh? You can thank me later.
I am capable of doing nice things sometimes, you know. Be glad I decided now would be one of those times.
Toolatewhocares!
Pfft! Like I'm gonna wait for an answer!
Ha! If you thought I was going to wait for an answer, you're dumb! If you thought I'd care, you're double dumb!
Oh wait I just remembered I don't care!
Pfffft! Me! Caring about rules! Hahahahahaha!
Yeahokaywhatever.
Aaaand I'm over it.
And now I'm over it. Bye, hat! Don't forget to write!
Nyoom! Look, it can fly! Fly away, hat! Go south for the winter or whatever!
Oops too bad I took off my scarf! ♪No taksies-backsies!♪
Oh no! My scarf fell off! Now I can't take off my top!
Oh no! My scarf! How unfortunate and totally not planned at all!
Whoa! Turns out I was just using misdirection and was taking off my scarf this whole time!
Woo! Feel that fresh air!
Get a load of these puppies!
Varimorph tits usually have, like, teeth and stuff, so you guys are super lucky that I decided to go with human tits today.
Aw yeah, that's much better. Pants freakin' suck!
Wait, where'd my dick go? Where did it go?!... Nah, just kiddin', I always know what's goin' on down there.
Aw yeah! Take it in, everyone! I might not look like this for much longer!
Oh my god! It's so normal! I can't believe it!
Where's my penis? Where's my penis?!
Oh my god, wetness? It's almost like I'm... enjoying this?!
Hell yes! Natural state! No stupid stuffy clothes!
Social structure is dumb! We should all run around naked all the time!
